# @mate-academy/stylelint-config

#### A simplified stylelint-config based on standard config. [Read more](https://mate-academy.github.io/style-guides/htmlcss.html) about rules.


## Install

```bash
npm install --save-dev @mate-academy/stylelint-config
```

## Usage

Add this to your `.stylelintrc` file:

```
{
  extends: "@mate-academy/stylelint-config"
}
```
